title: I feel like Riot did a really good job on Sylas's mobility
body:
He technically has 3 dashes, but only one of them can be used outside of combat, which gives him the potential to stick to target, but not be able to freely use his mobility to escape a fight if he goes in
The shield on his E is a LITTLE overtuned, but other than that I think this is an example of an acceptable amount of mobility

replies.body: Yeah, it's a reasonable amount of mobility, just like Tony Montana indulged in a reasonable amount of the product he sold.

Honestly, I don't see why everyone hates the champion so much. Obviously as a new champion there are some issues that they will have to work with, like that shield and also the heal on his W, but at the same time he's not a champion that you can just spam abilities like {{champion:11}} or {{champion:86}}, there's a certain amount of skill that goes into playing Sylas well, and I think a lot of people don't understand that he's only a broken champion if you play him well, but he won't be as good if you can't, especially after he is balanced a little
